眉來眼去.definition: (idiom) to make eyes; to exchange flirting glances with sb

眉尖.definition: eyebrows (esp. as sth knitted 皺|皱[zhou4] into a frown); outer tip of an eyebrow

眉山市.definition: Meishan, prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province 四川省[Si4chuan1 Sheng3]

眉心輪.definition: ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead; also written 眉間輪|眉间轮[mei2 jian1 lun2]

眉批.definition: headnotes; comments or footnotes at top of the page

眉毛鬍子一把抓.pinyin: méi máo hú zi yī bǎ zhuā
眉毛鬍子一把抓.definition: careless; any-old-how, regardless of the specific task

眉目.definition: progress; prospect of solution; sign of positive outcome

眉目傳情.definition: to make sheep eyes at; to cast amorous glances at

眉眼.definition: brows and eyes; appearance; looks; countenance

眉眼傳情.definition: to give the eye to; to make eyes at

眉睫.definition: eyebrows and eyelashes; (fig.) close at hand; urgent; pressing; imperative

眉端.definition: tip of the eyebrows; top margin on a page

眉縣.definition: Mei County in Baoji 寶雞|宝鸡[Bao3 ji1], Shaanxi

眉角.definition: outer tip of the eyebrow; (facial) expression; (Tw) knack; trick of the trade

眉開眼笑.definition: brows raised in delight, eyes laughing (idiom); beaming with joy; all smiles

眉間.definition: the flat area of forehead between the eyebrows; glabella

眉間輪.definition: ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead

眉飛色舞.definition: smiles of exultation; radiant with delight
